name: Gate Of Sleep
description:
In this game, we play as a person who is stuck in a dream. He needs to collect memories of the outside world in order to wake up. 

 The main character found himself in a dream, in the form of a Lego man, he should cope with the new image and try to get out of sleep. But not everything is so simple, on the way to search for memories, there will be spirits of sleep that will try to move into the hero, causing damage. To fend off them, have time to click on the spirit with a double click of the left mouse button. 

 Collect all four memory fragments, or stay in the dream forever, the choice is yours!

 version - v. Alpha 0.1
